note: Live in Palm Beach County. I'm a paralegal. I like Sci Fi, Action Adventure, fantasy. I never watch horror movies. Single. Poor. Independent lean left. Love to cook. Ex was a chef. Wud like to do that van living for a year or so. As a veteran of US Navy, can stay in Federal & State parks for half the cost and sometimes free. Dying to go to Burning Man one day. Checking off a bucket list. Did the skydiving and scuba, have a few things left to do. Best vacation was to Barcelona. That's me.
